messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Oi things are fucked AIs rogue HOPS also fucked we're fucked

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Primary Hallway.
